topics.body:
I have 3 episodes left of School Rumble.

Karasuma finally showed emotion and stopped being so pivotal to the story.

Harima fucking up lost its charm but the series is almost over so I give it a pass.

Yakumo may be interesting

Eri has sadly been underwhelming due to too little focus with so much unexplored.

topics.author: 4fdfbf92945b7075d50036e4

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5393b6d46368723369230000#post_5393b6d46368723369230000
I'm not a weeaboo either.
In fact I hate the weeaboos.

"Samurai is best warrior!" "Katana is best sword!"
No fuck you.
A Viking could beat a Samurai, even if only because a Scandinavian man will be a lot more athletically gifted than a Japanese guy
topics.author: 4fe16df67f123b13e400003f

topics.body:
"@Whatevs":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5393b7a263687217ae0d0000#post_5393b7a263687217ae0d0000
And while a Scandinavian would blindly charge into battle completely naked like an idiot, the samurai was using the most advanced armor for it's time.
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5393bd006368721b51b90000#post_5393bd006368721b51b90000
>naked
!http://static.giantbomb.com/uploads/original/0/9456/2390114-viking_waxe.jpg!
topics.author: 5007bbdf7f123b112f00023a

topics.body:
"@PaskaNaakka":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5393bd7863687215aadc0000#post_5393bd7863687215aadc0000
Even still. Not to mention the Samurai were one of the first to use firearms.
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5393bd006368721b51b90000#post_5393bd006368721b51b90000
>advanced armor
Their armor was vastly inferior to plate or mail (which could stop a katana).

Vikings actually used very sophisticated tactics, especially in one-on-one fights.

And had better swords
topics.author: 4fe16df67f123b13e400003f

topics.body:
"@Whatevs":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5393be376368721556250100#post_5393be376368721556250100
Any army that fights in a one-on-one basis is retarded. Samurai armor was lighter and stronger. Plus they had waaaaaaaay more weaponry than a simple katana. The naginata (spear), the yumi (bow), and the tanegashima (handcannon)
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5393bf0763687215564c0100#post_5393bf0763687215564c0100
>one on one basis
Vikings used rather refined shield wall tactics.

Katanas (and swords in general) were secondary weapons anyway. On a battlefield polearms and bows would be much more effective.
topics.author: 5007bbdf7f123b112f00023a

topics.body:
I just landed from my flight and I have another one in 3 hours.
So, I'm gonna make this quick.

If you could change one moment in history, what would you change, what would be the outcome and how will the world (or just you) face the consequences of time travel?

Because come on, every time traveling movie has those "You changed the past, now you must fix it or face the consequences of your actions!".
topics.author: 4fe1b9f47f123b13df002976
